definitions.text: the act of putting a person into a non-elective position
examples: the appointment had to be approved by the whole committee
she asked how to avoid kissing at the end of a date

definitions.text: (usually plural) furnishings and equipment (especially for a ship or hotel)
a person who is appointed to a job or position
the job to which you are (or hope to be) appointed
examples: he applied for an appointment in the treasury

definitions.text: (law) the act of disposing of property by virtue of the power of appointment
examples: she allocated part of the trust to her church by appointment
